content: all the patterns in my store are free on my youtube channel subscribe and there are a lot of original tutorials on the channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucbyydgpk7p8kbyjqvk9yzbg ***this is a crochet pattern not a real toy*** crochet pattern of a plush bunny in frog clothing toy size 15 cm 5 90 inches only english patterns the pdf also includes a lot of photos and a detailed description there are also links to video tutorials there are many moments that are shown in the video for these patterns you need to have basic crochet and amigurumi skills as well as be able to read crochet patterns these templates are for personal use only please do not copy share translate or distribute the template you can sell bags you made but be sure to credit the pattern maker
